supportPlatform.message: Please select the platform that your project will support.

supportPlatforms.message: Please select the platform that your plugin will support.
supportPlatforms.hint: - Space to select. Return to submit

sceneSelect.message: Choose a scene package to quickly start the project.

choices.title: game
choices.description: Game development, install leafer-game (includes game plugins).

choices.title: editor
choices.description: Graphic editing, install leafer-editor (includes editor plugins).

choices.title: full
choices.description: Full bundle, install leafer (includes leafer-ui and all @leafer-in/*).

leaferInSelect.message: Choose the official feature plugins you want.
leaferInSelect.hint: - Space to select. Return to submit. Use Up/Down to scroll

choices.title: text-editor
choices.description: Text editing on double-click (web PC only).

choices.title: color
choices.description: Color format conversion / name to value.

shouldOverwrite.message: is not empty. Remove existing files and continue?

packageName.message: Package name (must be a valid npm package name):
packageName.hint: Leave empty to use the project name

pluginPackageName.hint:
plugin's package name should start with 'leafer-x-' 
upper-layer application's package name should start with 'leafer-'

welcome.message: Like a small tree sprouting, continuously growing, full of hope and vitality.
